Title: Illusion Sweetheart Lace Evening Dress with Slit

Featured-image: KD016-ivory-illusion-sweetheart-lace-evening-dress-with-slit_p.jpg

----

Description: Lace overlay covers this gown and creates paisley designs throughout. The illusion back is embellished with lace detailing creating a floral look. The neckline and shoulders are trimmed with the same floral design. The high split in the front of the skirt compliments the flowing train of the back.
